content: I wonder who the "growing number of national security experts" are. Do they have names? I say put a few Marines abourd US flagged vessels transiting areas threatened by pirates. A squad would do it. Or is that overkill? Seriously, we don't need mercenaries.

content: Plus, the Navy and Marines are not a police force and they have more important things to be occupied with than going after pirates who are going after private corporations and their people. The Constitution gives Congress the power to issue letters of marque and reprisal when a precise declaration of war is impossible due to the vagueness of the enemy. And, this is one of those situations. Ron always does things within the context of the Constitution and this is no exception. Arrr!
reply: Plus, the Navy and Marines are not a police force and they have more important things to be occupied with than going after pirates who are going after private corporations and their people.
